replies.body: Yes! There's always a Honey Roasted Cashew cart at the Sydney Rock Markets! This %%%% is what I live for!

Where may I attain these?

Or should I make them myself?
http://shop.coles.com.au/online/national/cashews-coles-brand-honey-roasted-prepacked absolutely the best treats on the planet :")
You are mistaken good sir, I believe you will find beef jerky to be the best snack on the planet.

Came to downvote

Please stop posting {{champion:35}}
